comment: WasHillary asking for "something to be done" days BEFORE the mail bombs started & then this synagogue shooting that even had FOX News try to tie to & and call us "right wing conspir-racists". We need to remind the Normies who are just waking up that we are at WAR with the Deep State & remind them of just how evil they are!
amr:
# ::snt WasHillary asking for "something to be done" days BEFORE the mail bombs started & then this synagogue shooting that even had FOX News try to tie to & and call us "right wing conspir-racists". We need to remind the Normies who are just waking up that we are at WAR with the Deep State & remind them of just how evil they are!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (a2 / ask-01
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Hillary"))
                  :ARG1 (d / do-02
                        :ARG1 (s / something))
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (s2 / start-01
                              :ARG1 (b2 / bomb
                                    :mod (m2 / mail)))
                        :quant (m3 / multiple
                              :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (d2 / day)))))
            :op2 (s3 / shoot-02
                  :ARG1 (s4 / synagogue)
                  :mod (t2 / this)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-04
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (t3 / try-01
                                    :ARG0 (b3 / broadcast-program
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "FOX"
                                                :op2 "News"))
                                    :ARG1 (t4 / tie-01
                                          :ARG0 b3
                                          :ARG1 (w / we)))
                              :op2 (c / call-01
                                    :ARG0 b3
                                    :ARG1 w
                                    :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (c2 / conspire-01)
                                          :ARG1-of (r / right-08)))))))
      :snt2 (n3 / need-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (r2 / remind-01
                  :ARG0 w2
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (w3 / war-01
                              :ARG0 w2
                              :ARG1 (s5 / state
                                    :ARG1-of (d3 / deep-02)))
                        :op2 r2
                        :ARG0 w2
                        :ARG1 (e / evil
                              :degree (s6 / so)
                              :domain (t5 / they))
                        :ARG2 t5))
            :ARG2 t5))

comment: Hi There, Please refrain from using racist or derogatory comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
amr:
# ::snt Hi There, Please refrain from using racist or derogatory comments. They are hurtful and do not reflect the views of most people here. Thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :mod (t / there)))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (c / comment-01
                              :mod (r2 / racist))
                        :op2 (c2 / comment-01
                              :mod (d / derogatory))))
            :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (a / and
                        :op1 (h2 / hurt-01
                              :ARG0 (t2 / they))
                        :op2 (r3 / reflect-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 t2
                              :ARG2 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG2-of (v / view-02
                                          :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                                :location (h3 / here)
                                                :quant (m2 / most))))))))
      :snt3 (t4 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 y))
